Title: Tangled Ever After
Genre: Animation, Short, Action, Comedy, Family, Musical
Writer: Nathan Greno, Byron Howard, Mark Kennedy (head of story), Robert L. Baird (additional story material), Daniel Gerson (additional story material)
Actors: Mandy Moore, Zachary Levi, Alan Dale, Paul F. Tompkins
Plot: Rapunzel and Flynn Rider have their wedding, but Pascal and Maximus must recover the rings they lose in mid-ceremony.
